Damascus. The capital of Syria.

is taken away = is swept away. This was by Tiglath-pileser, king of Assyria, and the slaughter of Rezin (632. B.C.) See2 Kings 16:9 , and2 Kings 7:9, 2 Kings 7:16 , above.

city. heap. Note the Figure of speech Paronomasia (App-6) Hebrew. me"ir. mei .
